p: The steady decline in RVFV genetic diversity since the 1970â€™s was previously reported [ 33], in an analysis that considered most of our samples. A possible explanation for the decline centers on the vaccination and control measures implemented on a large scale from 1969 to 1979 [ 45]. In all, 35.2 million vaccines were provided to Zimbabwe, South Africa, Namibia, Israel, and Egypt in response to large RVF outbreaks [ 46].
